Package com.example.service

Class ItemService

java.lang.Object
com.example.service.ItemService
@Service public class ItemService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing items, lots, dependencies, and items for a period. Provides methods to retrieve, add, remove, and check items in various contexts (favourites, dependencies, etc.).

    • getItems

      public org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<List<Item>,Long> getItems(String name, String category, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a filtered list of items based on the provided name and category.
      Parameters:
      name - the name filter for items
      category - the category filter for items
      pageable - pagination details
      Returns:
      a pair containing the list of items and the total count

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(long id)
      Retrieves a specific item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item to retrieve
      Returns:
      the item with the specified ID
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no item with the given ID is found

    • getFavouriteItems

      public org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<List<Item>,Long> getFavouriteItems(String email, String name, String category, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a list of favourite items for a user, with optional name and category filters.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address
      name - the name filter for favourite items
      category - the category filter for favourite items
      pageable - pagination details
      Returns:
      a pair containing the list of favourite items and the total count
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the user does not exist

    • isFavourite

      public boolean isFavourite(String email, long id)
      Checks if an item is marked as a favourite by a user.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email address
      id - the ID of the item to check
      Returns:
      true if the item is a favourite, false otherwise
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the user or item does not exist

      id - the ID of the item to add as a favourite
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the user or item does not exist
